sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The true choice of a friend. Shewing the comfort of a faithfull friend. : A friend is neerer then a brother.. Reasons metamorphosis and restauration Goldwell, Charles.
[10], 174, [12], 68, 28 p.
Printed for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sold at the signe of theTalbot, in Pater-noster-Row., London, : 1625..
[Part 2] has special t.-p. which reads: Choyce, and applications, which may serue partly for the vse of the precedent treatise ... by Charles Goldwel ... London, Prined [sic] by Bernard Alsop for Iohn Pyper, 1621. Appears to be a copy of his Reasons metamorphosis and restauration (printed for J. Pyper in 1621) with a new title page substituted for the original one. Imperfect: 1 or more leaves between A 5 and B 1 wanting; tightly bound, with loss of print.. Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library. [pt.1] Reasons metamorphosis and restauration. -- [pt.2] Choyce, and applications. -- [pt.3] My friend.
=======
The true choice of a friend. Shewing the comfort of a faithfull friend. : A friend is neerer then a brother.. Reasons metamorphosis and restauration Goldwell, Charles.
[10], 174, [12], 68, 28 p.
Printed for Beniamin Fisher, and are to be sold at the signe of theTalbot, in Pater-noster-Row., London, : 1625..
[Part 2] has special t.-p. which reads: Choyce, and applications, which may serue partly for the vse of the precedent treatise ... by Charles Goldwel ... London, Prined [sic] by Bernard Alsop for Iohn Pyper, 1621. Appears to be a copy of his Reasons metamorphosis and restauration (printed for J. Pyper in 1621) with a new title page substituted for the original one. Imperfect: 1 or more leaves between A 5 and B 1 wanting; tightly bound, with loss of print.. Reproduction of original in: Newberry Library. [pt.1] Reasons metamorphosis and restauration. -- [pt.2] Choyce, and applications. -- [pt.3] My friend.
Beniamin Fisher
the signe of theTalbot, in Pater-noster-Row.
>>>>>>> imprintparse
